#include <cstdio>
#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstring>
#include <cassert>
using namespace std;
#define p(x) cout<<#x<<":"<<x<<"\n"

int x,y,i;
char o;
double s;
char str[100];

int main()
{
  scanf("%d%c%d",&x,&o,&y);
  assert(x>1);
  assert(max(x,y)<=100000000);
  if(o=='!')
  {
    assert(y==0);
    for(i=2;i<=x;i++)
      s+=log10(i);	
	s++;
  }
  else if(o=='*')
  {
    assert(y>0);
    sprintf(str,"%lld",(long long)x*y);
    s=strlen(str);
  }
  else if(o=='/')
  {
    assert(y>0);
	if(x/y==0)
	  s=0;
	else
	{
	  sprintf(str,"%d",x/y);
      s=strlen(str);
	}
  }
  else 
  {
    assert(y>=0);
	s=y*log10(x)+1;
  }
  printf("%d\n",(int)(s+1e-8));
  return 0;
}
